name: Nothawthorne.GitHub.io
body:
###Biography  
**Name**: Alexander Kozma  
**Age**: 20  
**Location**: South Florida  
  
###Projects  
* **Project Name**: Shard  
* **Languages Employed**: Lua, C++  
* **Libraries Utilized**: [AIO](http://rochet2.github.io/AIO.html)  
* **Description**: An extreme modification of core World of Warcraft systems for use in private servers.  
* **Screenshot**: [Link](http://i.imgur.com/87kS5Djm.jpg)  
* **Repo**: [Link](https://github.com/NotHawthorne/Shard-Emulation)  
***
* **Project Name**: meshh  
* **Languages Employed**: C++  
* **Libraries Utilized**: [Qt 5.4](https://github.com/qtproject/qt5)  
* **Description**: A decentralized social networking solution.
* **Screenshot**: [Link](http://i.imgur.com/v1AJnRo.png)  
* **Repo**: Upon request.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
